overview: You won't see any of the bloodshed and mayhem for which GG's live performances were known, nor any of the spectacle that has helped create a cult around his public persona since his death in 1993. This is GG at his most candid, talking about his life and his art, as well as the baggage that goes with being GG Allin. The footage, pictures and music are from time spent with GG in Charlotte North Carolina and Tampa Florida.
title: Carnival of Excess
